gov.usgs.anss.edge

Class TimeSeriesBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.edge.TimeSeriesBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<TimeSeriesBlock>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MiniSeed, TraceBuf

    public abstract class TimeSeriesBlock
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<TimeSeriesBlock>
    This is an abstract class describing the requirements for a generalized TimeSeriesBlock. Basically certain routines are required like getSeedNameString(), getNsamp, etc. needed for some class to handle these types.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(TimeSeriesBlock o)
        Compare this MiniSeed object to another. First the two objects' SEED names are compared, and if they are equal, their starting dates are compared.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<TimeSeriesBlock>
        Parameters:
        o - the other MiniSeed object
        Returns:
        -1 if this object is less than other, 0 if the two objects are equal, and +1 if this object is greater than other.
